title: BRIEF-India's IndiGo Places Firm Order For 300 Airbus A320neo Family Aircraft
text:
BRIEF-India's IndiGo Places Firm Order For 300 Airbus A320neo Family Aircraft

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 29, 2019 18:31)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's IndiGo Places Firm Order For 300 Airbus A320neo Family Aircraft Oct 29 (Reuters) - Interglobe Aviation Ltd : * SAYS SIGNS FOR 300 A320NEO FAMILY AIRCRAFT * SAYS FIRM ORDER COMPRISES A MIX OF A320NEO, A321NEO AND A321XLR AIRCRAFT * SAYS ORDER WILL TAKE INDIGO'S TOTAL NUMBER OF A320NEO FAMILY AIRCRAFT ORDERS TO 730 * CHOICE OF ENGINE MANUFACTURER FOR AIRBUS ORDER WILL BE MADE AT A LATER DATE - CEO RONOJOY DUTTA

BRIEF-India's IndiGo Places Firm Order For 300 Airbus A320neo Family Aircraft
description: BRIEF-India's IndiGo Places Firm Order For 300 Airbus A320neo Family Aircraft
